other_tests.findings: Inflammatory cell infiltrate with organisms appearing as broad, nonseptate hyphae.

other_tests.procedure_name: Bronchoscopy with injection of amphotericin B
other_tests.findings: Injection of amphotericin B into the lesion during bronchoscopy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant reduction in opacity noted on repeat chest computed tomographic scan six months later.
